title: Set up application logging infrastructure
description: Configure Winston or Pino logger for the application with appropriate log levels, formatters, and transports for both development and production environments

title: Implement structured logging middleware
description: Create Express middleware to log HTTP requests/responses with relevant metadata (method, URL, status, response time, user ID) and integrate with the main logger

title: Configure error tracking with Sentry
description: Set up Sentry for production error tracking, configure source maps, set up environments (dev/staging/prod), and implement error boundaries for React components

title: Implement application metrics collection
description: Set up Prometheus client to collect custom metrics (API response times, database query performance, cache hit rates) and expose metrics endpoint
